verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As we're gathered,
May Your Spirit work within us.
As we're gathered, may we glorify Your name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Knowing well that as our hearts begin to worship
We'll be blessed because we came.
We'll be blessed because we came.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Al adorarte, que su Espíritu obre adentro.
Al adorarte, Te glorificamos Dios;
Sabiendo que al adorarte el corazón
Nos bendecirá Tu amor,
Nos bendecirá Tu amor.
